about_the_game:
Dread descends over Biscuit as he discovers Mama is gone one dark and stormy night. To find her, you must guide the young cat as he retraces his past and braves the eldritch terrors lurking in the forest and beyond.

Etched Memories is a horror adventure game combining dynamic combat mechanics, intricate puzzles, whimsical characters, and more!

“He who fights with monsters should be careful lest he thereby become a monster.
And if thou gaze long into an abyss, the abyss will also gaze into thee.” - Friedrich Nietzsche

GAME MECHANICS

Camera/Perspective
Toggle between third or first person point-of-view (if you dare). The choice is yours!

Combat
Ranged or melee? Why not both? Strike down foes with an arsenal of unique weapons and accessories at your disposal. It’s dangerous to go alone so grab a weapon or two or three. Paired with some (c)a(t)crobatics, you’ll be unstoppable!

Item Collection and Storage
Do rocks suit your fancy? What about that electron microscope you’ve been coveting? Prehensile paws sure come in handy!

Puzzles
All that brawn needs some brains.

Companions
Fight alone or with a team! Recruit loyal allycats to your side.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains violence and gore.

short_description: Be a cat and navigate the aftermath of an unexpected catastrophe in this one-of-a-kind action-horror adventure. Confront dangers within and without, forge bonds or break them, kill or be killed in this cat-eat-cat world. Build new memories through a heartfelt story that won’t soon be forgotten!
